AddCustomAttributes.name: AddCustomAttributes
AddCustomAttributes.description: Grants permission to add user attributes to the user pool schema

AdminAddUserToGroup.name: AdminAddUserToGroup
AdminAddUserToGroup.description: Grants permission to add any user to any group

AdminConfirmSignUp.name: AdminConfirmSignUp
AdminConfirmSignUp.description: Grants permission to confirm any user's registration without a confirmation code

AdminCreateUser.name: AdminCreateUser
AdminCreateUser.description: Grants permission to create new users and send welcome messages via email or SMS

AdminDeleteUser.name: AdminDeleteUser
AdminDeleteUser.description: Grants permission to delete any user

AdminDeleteUserAttributes.name: AdminDeleteUserAttributes
AdminDeleteUserAttributes.description: Grants permission to delete attributes from any user

AdminDisableProviderForUser.name: AdminDisableProviderForUser
AdminDisableProviderForUser.description: Grants permission to unlink any user pool user from a third-party identity provider (IdP) user

AdminDisableUser.name: AdminDisableUser
AdminDisableUser.description: Grants permission to deactivate any user

AdminEnableUser.name: AdminEnableUser
AdminEnableUser.description: Grants permission to activate any user

AdminForgetDevice.name: AdminForgetDevice
AdminForgetDevice.description: Grants permission to deregister any user's devices

AdminGetDevice.name: AdminGetDevice
AdminGetDevice.description: Grants permission to get information about any user's devices

AdminGetUser.name: AdminGetUser
AdminGetUser.description: Grants permission to look up any user by user name

AdminInitiateAuth.name: AdminInitiateAuth
AdminInitiateAuth.description: Grants permission to authenticate any user

AdminLinkProviderForUser.name: AdminLinkProviderForUser
AdminLinkProviderForUser.description: Grants permission to link any user pool user to a third-party IdP user

AdminListDevices.name: AdminListDevices
AdminListDevices.description: Grants permission to list any user's remembered devices

AdminListGroupsForUser.name: AdminListGroupsForUser
AdminListGroupsForUser.description: Grants permission to list the groups that any user belongs to

AdminListUserAuthEvents.name: AdminListUserAuthEvents
AdminListUserAuthEvents.description: Grants permission to lists sign-in events for any user

AdminRemoveUserFromGroup.name: AdminRemoveUserFromGroup
AdminRemoveUserFromGroup.description: Grants permission to remove any user from any group

AdminResetUserPassword.name: AdminResetUserPassword
AdminResetUserPassword.description: Grants permission to reset any user's password

AdminRespondToAuthChallenge.name: AdminRespondToAuthChallenge
AdminRespondToAuthChallenge.description: Grants permission to respond to an authentication challenge during the authentication of any user

AdminSetUserMFAPreference.name: AdminSetUserMFAPreference
AdminSetUserMFAPreference.description: Grants permission to set any user's preferred MFA method

AdminSetUserPassword.name: AdminSetUserPassword
AdminSetUserPassword.description: Grants permission to set any user's password

AdminSetUserSettings.name: AdminSetUserSettings
AdminSetUserSettings.description: Grants permission to set user settings for any user

AdminUpdateAuthEventFeedback.name: AdminUpdateAuthEventFeedback
AdminUpdateAuthEventFeedback.description: Grants permission to update advanced security feedback for any user's authentication event

AdminUpdateDeviceStatus.name: AdminUpdateDeviceStatus
AdminUpdateDeviceStatus.description: Grants permission to update the status of any user's remembered devices

AdminUpdateUserAttributes.name: AdminUpdateUserAttributes
AdminUpdateUserAttributes.description: Grants permission to updates any user's standard or custom attributes

AdminUserGlobalSignOut.name: AdminUserGlobalSignOut
AdminUserGlobalSignOut.description: Grants permission to sign out any user from all sessions

AssociateSoftwareToken.name: AssociateSoftwareToken
AssociateSoftwareToken.description: Grants permission to return a unique generated shared secret key code for the user

AssociateWebACL.name: AssociateWebACL
AssociateWebACL.description: Grants permission to associate the user pool with an AWS WAF web ACL

ChangePassword.name: ChangePassword
ChangePassword.description: Grants permission to change the password for a specified user in a user pool

ConfirmDevice.name: ConfirmDevice
ConfirmDevice.description: Grants permission to confirm tracking of the device. This API call is the call that begins device tracking

ConfirmForgotPassword.name: ConfirmForgotPassword
ConfirmForgotPassword.description: Grants permission to allow a user to enter a confirmation code to reset a forgotten password

ConfirmSignUp.name: ConfirmSignUp
ConfirmSignUp.description: Grants permission to confirm registration of a user and handles the existing alias from a previous user

CreateGroup.name: CreateGroup
CreateGroup.description: Grants permission to create new user pool groups

CreateIdentityProvider.name: CreateIdentityProvider
CreateIdentityProvider.description: Grants permission to add identity providers to user pools

CreateResourceServer.name: CreateResourceServer
CreateResourceServer.description: Grants permission to create and configure scopes for OAuth 2.0 resource servers

CreateUserImportJob.name: CreateUserImportJob
CreateUserImportJob.description: Grants permission to create user CSV import jobs

CreateUserPool.name: CreateUserPool
CreateUserPool.description: Grants permission to create and set password policy for user pools

CreateUserPoolClient.name: CreateUserPoolClient
CreateUserPoolClient.description: Grants permission to create user pool app clients

CreateUserPoolDomain.name: CreateUserPoolDomain
CreateUserPoolDomain.description: Grants permission to add user pool domains

DeleteGroup.name: DeleteGroup
DeleteGroup.description: Grants permission to delete any empty user pool group

DeleteIdentityProvider.name: DeleteIdentityProvider
DeleteIdentityProvider.description: Grants permission to delete any identity provider from user pools

DeleteResourceServer.name: DeleteResourceServer
DeleteResourceServer.description: Grants permission to delete any OAuth 2.0 resource server from user pools

DeleteUser.name: DeleteUser
DeleteUser.description: Grants permission to allow a user to delete one's self

DeleteUserAttributes.name: DeleteUserAttributes
DeleteUserAttributes.description: Grants permission to delete the attributes for a user

DeleteUserPool.name: DeleteUserPool
DeleteUserPool.description: Grants permission to delete user pools

DeleteUserPoolClient.name: DeleteUserPoolClient
DeleteUserPoolClient.description: Grants permission to delete any user pool app client

DeleteUserPoolDomain.name: DeleteUserPoolDomain
DeleteUserPoolDomain.description: Grants permission to delete any user pool domain

DescribeIdentityProvider.name: DescribeIdentityProvider
DescribeIdentityProvider.description: Grants permission to describe any user pool identity provider

DescribeResourceServer.name: DescribeResourceServer
DescribeResourceServer.description: Grants permission to describe any OAuth 2.0 resource server

DescribeRiskConfiguration.name: DescribeRiskConfiguration
DescribeRiskConfiguration.description: Grants permission to describe the risk configuration settings of user pools and app clients

DescribeUserImportJob.name: DescribeUserImportJob
DescribeUserImportJob.description: Grants permission to describe any user import job

DescribeUserPool.name: DescribeUserPool
DescribeUserPool.description: Grants permission to describe user pools

DescribeUserPoolClient.name: DescribeUserPoolClient
DescribeUserPoolClient.description: Grants permission to describe any user pool app client

DescribeUserPoolDomain.name: DescribeUserPoolDomain
DescribeUserPoolDomain.description: Grants permission to describe any user pool domain

DisassociateWebACL.name: DisassociateWebACL
DisassociateWebACL.description: Grants permission to disassociate the user pool with an AWS WAF web ACL

ForgetDevice.name: ForgetDevice
ForgetDevice.description: Grants permission to forget the specified device

ForgotPassword.name: ForgotPassword
ForgotPassword.description: Grants permission to send a message to the end user with a confirmation code that is required to change the user's password

GetCSVHeader.name: GetCSVHeader
GetCSVHeader.description: Grants permission to generate headers for a user import .csv file

GetDevice.name: GetDevice
GetDevice.description: Grants permission to get the device

GetGroup.name: GetGroup
GetGroup.description: Grants permission to describe a user pool group

GetIdentityProviderByIdentifier.name: GetIdentityProviderByIdentifier
GetIdentityProviderByIdentifier.description: Grants permission to correlate a user pool IdP identifier to the IdP Name

GetLogDeliveryConfiguration.name: GetLogDeliveryConfiguration
GetLogDeliveryConfiguration.description: Grants permission to get the detailed activity logging configuration for a user pool

GetSigningCertificate.name: GetSigningCertificate
GetSigningCertificate.description: Grants permission to look up signing certificates for user pools

GetUICustomization.name: GetUICustomization
GetUICustomization.description: Grants permission to get UI customization information for the hosted UI of any app client

GetUser.name: GetUser
GetUser.description: Grants permission to get the user attributes and metadata for a user

GetUserAttributeVerificationCode.name: GetUserAttributeVerificationCode
GetUserAttributeVerificationCode.description: Grants permission to get the user attribute verification code for the specified attribute name

GetUserPoolMfaConfig.name: GetUserPoolMfaConfig
GetUserPoolMfaConfig.description: Grants permission to look up the MFA configuration of user pools

GetWebACLForResource.name: GetWebACLForResource
GetWebACLForResource.description: Grants permission to get the AWS WAF web ACL that is associated with an Amazon Cognito user pool

GlobalSignOut.name: GlobalSignOut
GlobalSignOut.description: Grants permission to sign out users from all devices

InitiateAuth.name: InitiateAuth
InitiateAuth.description: Grants permission to initiate the authentication flow

ListDevices.name: ListDevices
ListDevices.description: Grants permission to list the devices

ListGroups.name: ListGroups
ListGroups.description: Grants permission to list all groups in user pools

ListIdentityProviders.name: ListIdentityProviders
ListIdentityProviders.description: Grants permission to list all identity providers in user pools

ListResourceServers.name: ListResourceServers
ListResourceServers.description: Grants permission to list all resource servers in user pools

ListResourcesForWebACL.name: ListResourcesForWebACL
ListResourcesForWebACL.description: Grants permission to list the user pools that are associated with an AWS WAF web ACL

ListTagsForResource.name: ListTagsForResource
ListTagsForResource.description: Grants permission to list the tags that are assigned to an Amazon Cognito user pool

ListUserImportJobs.name: ListUserImportJobs
ListUserImportJobs.description: Grants permission to list all user import jobs

ListUserPoolClients.name: ListUserPoolClients
ListUserPoolClients.description: Grants permission to list all app clients in user pools

ListUserPools.name: ListUserPools
ListUserPools.description: Grants permission to list all user pools

ListUsers.name: ListUsers
ListUsers.description: Grants permission to list all user pool users

ListUsersInGroup.name: ListUsersInGroup
ListUsersInGroup.description: Grants permission to list the users in any group

ResendConfirmationCode.name: ResendConfirmationCode
ResendConfirmationCode.description: Grants permission to resend the confirmation (for confirmation of registration) to a specific user in the user pool

RespondToAuthChallenge.name: RespondToAuthChallenge
RespondToAuthChallenge.description: Grants permission to respond to the authentication challenge

RevokeToken.name: RevokeToken
RevokeToken.description: Grants permission to revoke all of the access tokens generated by the specified refresh token

SetLogDeliveryConfiguration.name: SetLogDeliveryConfiguration
SetLogDeliveryConfiguration.description: Grants permission to set up or modify the detailed activity logging configuration of a user pool

SetRiskConfiguration.name: SetRiskConfiguration
SetRiskConfiguration.description: Grants permission to set risk configuration for user pools and app clients

SetUICustomization.name: SetUICustomization
SetUICustomization.description: Grants permission to customize the hosted UI for any app client

SetUserMFAPreference.name: SetUserMFAPreference
SetUserMFAPreference.description: Grants permission to set MFA preference for the user in the userpool

SetUserPoolMfaConfig.name: SetUserPoolMfaConfig
SetUserPoolMfaConfig.description: Grants permission to set user pool MFA configuration

SetUserSettings.name: SetUserSettings
SetUserSettings.description: Grants permission to set the user settings like multi-factor authentication (MFA)

SignUp.name: SignUp
SignUp.description: Grants permission to register the user in the specified user pool and creates a user name, password, and user attributes

StartUserImportJob.name: StartUserImportJob
StartUserImportJob.description: Grants permission to start any user import job

StopUserImportJob.name: StopUserImportJob
StopUserImportJob.description: Grants permission to stop any user import job

TagResource.name: TagResource
TagResource.description: Grants permission to tag a user pool

UntagResource.name: UntagResource
UntagResource.description: Grants permission to untag a user pool

UpdateAuthEventFeedback.name: UpdateAuthEventFeedback
UpdateAuthEventFeedback.description: Grants permission to update the feedback for the user authentication event

UpdateDeviceStatus.name: UpdateDeviceStatus
UpdateDeviceStatus.description: Grants permission to update the device status

UpdateGroup.name: UpdateGroup
UpdateGroup.description: Grants permission to update the configuration of any group

UpdateIdentityProvider.name: UpdateIdentityProvider
UpdateIdentityProvider.description: Grants permission to update the configuration of any user pool IdP

UpdateResourceServer.name: UpdateResourceServer
UpdateResourceServer.description: Grants permission to update the configuration of any OAuth 2.0 resource server

UpdateUserAttributes.name: UpdateUserAttributes
UpdateUserAttributes.description: Grants permission to allow a user to update a specific attribute (one at a time)

UpdateUserPool.name: UpdateUserPool
UpdateUserPool.description: Grants permission to updates the configuration of user pools

UpdateUserPoolClient.name: UpdateUserPoolClient
UpdateUserPoolClient.description: Grants permission to update any user pool client

UpdateUserPoolDomain.name: UpdateUserPoolDomain
UpdateUserPoolDomain.description: Grants permission to replace the certificate for any custom domain

VerifySoftwareToken.name: VerifySoftwareToken
VerifySoftwareToken.description: Grants permission to register a user's entered TOTP code and mark the user's software token MFA status as verified if successful

VerifyUserAttribute.name: VerifyUserAttribute
VerifyUserAttribute.description: Grants permission to verify a user attribute using a one time verification code
